stories.title: KM3NeT the next generation neutrino telescopes

stories.text: According to Hacker News guidelines, it is not recommendable to write stuff that may be considered "off-topic" such as "...most stories about politics..". However, information about wars that involve America is something that interests activist hackers, who need to be exposed to dissenting information (that is reasonable and not fake) to be able to make decisions for the greater good.
stories.title: Why HN is flagging posts that critique Biden's approach to Ukraine's problem?
How to Build Quality Software Fast

stories.text: There is no way to do it on the web app. I sent emails to try have it removed, first one being on the 26th of Feb, all I got was an auto acknowledgement that it was received (Zendesk) and subsequent auto followups telling me the ticket is awaiting my response, even though there is nothing for me to respond to. I sent a follow up mail and still nothing. Has anyone actually managed to get their payment details removed from there?
stories.title: Ask HN: Has anyone managed to get credit card details removed from dockerhub?
